abstract: The Republican candidates for president have taken turns being in the spotlight during the debates. On Tuesday, the spotlight falls on Herman Cain.
snippet: The Republican candidates for president have taken turns being in the spotlight during the debates. On Tuesday, the spotlight falls on Herman Cain.
lead_paragraph: Many of the Republican candidates for president have found that being in the spotlight during the televised debates can be uncomfortable and politically dangerous.

headline.main: Cain's Turn in the Hot Seat
